trans-unit.source: Represents a transformation that is a composite of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> children in its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示轉換的複合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref>中的子系其<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class is useful when grouping transformations that are applied to some objects in a scene but not others.
trans-unit.target: 群組會套用到場景而非其他電腦中的某些物件的轉換時，此類別會很有用的。

trans-unit.source: It also allows developers to re-use transformations by defining them once and then adding them to different Transform3DGroup objects.
trans-unit.target: 它也可讓開發人員可以重新定義一次，然後將它們加入到不同的 Transform3DGroup 物件使用的轉換。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空集合。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup.Children*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup.Children*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup.Children*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the transformation is affine.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否為仿射轉換。

trans-unit.source: True if the transformation is affine; false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 轉換是仿射; 如果為 truefalse 否則。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> that indicates the current transform value.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref> ，指出目前的轉換值。

trans-unit.source: Matrix3D that indicates the current transform value.
trans-unit.target: Matrix3D，指出目前的轉換值。
